descriptionSection.description: Developed a Discord bot designed as an AI coaching companion for Valorant players. Once linked with a user's Riot account, the bot automatically delivers post-match summaries and performance analyses, comparing the user's stats against both personal and rank-based averages.
features: Request agent-specific lineups for selected maps and positions (e.g., A/B/Mid, with ability filters)
Chat directly with an AI agent powered by ChatGPT, integrated using Microsoft Semantic Kernel
descriptionSection.techDescription: The backend leverages Semantic Kernel plugins to fetch personalized user data, game metadata (agents, maps, weapons), and perform natural language understanding via a vector database for enhanced contextual relevance.

descriptionSection.description: Initially led frontend development and UI/UX design for a web platform hosting game-specific esports training content. After the CTO stepped back from day-to-day responsibilities, I assumed full control of the platform’s tech stack, including backend development and database architecture.
features: Hosts both curated and user-generated training content, with access governed by subscription tier
Coaches can form organizations with multiple locations, inviting other coaches to collaborate privately
Group management tools allow coaches to assign exercises and schedule sessions for students
Integrated calendar system to track session dates across an organization’s locations and coaches
Rich text editor powered by TinyMCE for content creation
Subscriptions and payments handled via Stripe
techBullets: Designed and implemented frontend using React.js, TypeScript, Remix, and Tailwind CSS
Led UI/UX design, focusing on responsiveness, coach workflows, and intuitive navigation
Later expanded to backend ownership: built API routes, designed and optimized MySQL schema, and managed cloud infrastructure
Integrated Stripe, Sendgrid, Sentry, and deployed via Vercel and Azure

descriptionSection.description: Designed, developed, and released a mobile physics-based puzzle game independently using the native Android Java SDK. Built entirely from scratch, including code, game design, art, and music.
highlights: Built core physics systems and gameplay mechanics without external engines
Composed and produced original chiptune music using Famitracker
Created all audio assets using Famitracker for music and SFXR for 8-bit sound effects
Published on Google Play with approximately 18,000 installs to date
Managed publishing, updates, and release process through Google Play Console

descriptionSection.description: Solo-developed an arcade-style vertical platformer using the Unity engine. Designed, built, and released the game independently, handling all code, game mechanics, UI, and sound design.
highlights: Implemented platforming mechanics, procedural level generation, and collision systems
Designed all gameplay and user interface interactions
Created 8-bit-style sound effects to match the minimalist aesthetic
Used Unity’s built-in geometry and materials for all visuals
Published on Google Play with over 3,000 installs to date
Managed publishing, updates, and release process through Google Play Console
